name: SnackSense
desc: SnackSense is designed to help users make healthier, smarter, and more eco-conscious food choices, By scanning the barcode of a snack item.

name: Kanban Board
desc: a full-stack implementation of a simplified Trello-like Kanban board, built using the MERN stack.

name: Career Compass
desc: Career Compass is a Job search MERN stack application to find the right job for developers and a platform to post jobs for recruiters.

name: Finboard
desc: FinBoard is a Customizable Finance Dashboard where users can build their own real-time finance monitoring dashboard

name: Speak Easy
desc: SpeakEasy is a Real time chat web application built using MERN stack and Socket.IO
